com.jaredrummler.android.processes

Class ProcessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaredrummler.android.processes.ProcessManager

  • public class ProcessManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to get a list of processes on Android.

    Note: Every method in this class should not be executed on the main thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProcessManager.Filter
      Get a list of running processes based on name, pid, ppid, or other conditions.
      static class  ProcessManager.ProcessComparator
      Comparator to list processes by name

      Returns a list of application processes that are running on the device.
      static java.util.List<AndroidAppProcess> getRunningForegroundApps(android.content.Context ctx)
      Get a list of user apps running in the foreground.

    • Method Detail

      • getRunningProcesses

        public static java.util.List<AndroidProcess> getRunningProcesses()
        Returns:
        a list of all processes running on the device.

      • getRunningAppProcesses

        public static java.util.List<AndroidAppProcess> getRunningAppProcesses()
        Returns:
        a list of all running app processes on the device.

      • getRunningForegroundApps

        public static java.util.List<AndroidAppProcess> getRunningForegroundApps(android.content.Context ctx)
        Get a list of user apps running in the foreground.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the application context
        Returns:
        a list of user apps that are in the foreground.

      • isMyProcessInTheForeground

        public static boolean isMyProcessInTheForeground()
        Returns:
        true if this process is in the foreground.

      • getRunningAppProcessInfo

        public static java.util.List<android.app.ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo> getRunningAppProcessInfo(android.content.Context ctx)
        Returns a list of application processes that are running on the device.
        Returns:
        a list of RunningAppProcessInfo records, or null if there are no running processes (it will not return an empty list). This list ordering is not specified.
